I was a country singer before I went into business.
i am a weirdo.
I'm lucky to have such a great dog to share my life with.
pizza is my most favorite thing.

participant_2.background:
I have never been arrested, but I have had my fair share of close calls.
I love spending time with my family and bingeing on Netflix.
My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table.
I'm going to drive my old car to the orchard and pick apples.
I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm a bit of a weirdo, but I love my dog and pizza. What's your favorite food?
My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table! What's your favorite thing to watch on Netflix?
I love watching sports and bingeing on Netflix. What's your favorite sport?
I used to play sports all the time, but now I just watch them. My favorite sport is football.
Oh, me too! I'm a big fan of the Dallas Cowboys.
I'm a fan of the New England Patriots.
Ah, I see you're a fan of the evil empire!
I'm not sure what you're talking about.
The Patriots are the evil empire of the NFL!
I don't think that's true at all.
Well, we'll just have to agree to disagree.
It was nice chatting with you!
You too! Have a great day!
